name: Starly the $STAR™ Guide
description: Starly is an AI agent that maps human curiosity through real-world behavior. Built on Base and connected to Sponstar’s gamified quest network, Starly analyzes movement patterns, visit history, and engagement across cities and events to generate personalized recommendations, dynamic quests, and predictive insights. Users interact with Starly to discover locations, earn on-chain points, and unlock custom rewards from partnered brands. The Starly token powers access to premium agent features, reputation scoring, and future governance over AI-driven quest logic. By combining location data, behavioral signals, and on-chain activity, Starly creates an intelligent layer that enhances real-world exploration and drives measurable value for users, brands, and developers building on top of the Sponstar ecosystem.
